reviewComments: You can always find a tasty meal on the menu. The food is fresh, hot and plentiful. We drop in for lunch or dinner and we are never disappointed.
They have 2 locations, in Lathrop and Ripon, but we usually go to Ripon. You pull up to a playground and picnic tables, where I can let my daughter out and watch her run out some... read more
If I lived anywhere in the vicinity, I would shop here every week. There's a huge variety of produce, as fresh as can be. The quality and price of the food is far better than... read more
We read the reviews for this winery while in Ripon and had to go visit. It's located among peach trees. We met the owner/winemaker Mark Lucca who also served us our tastings. We... read more

There is some camping and swimming available, but that is about it. Mosquitoes can be bad certain times of the year.
